timeline.title: Software Engineer, Associate
timeline.description:
Conduct Work in developing cross-platform mobile applications (iOS and Android) as well as Backend applications. 

We mainly develop using Agile over two-week sprints.

timeline.title: Project Intern
timeline.description: I worked in a team of students focussing on projects centred around applications development, robotics, machine learning and designing courses to teach other students about these applications of technology.
